events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund for the purchase. The product is not what I ordered and I want to know how to proceed.
The customer's message indicates a request for a refund due to receiving the wrong item, so the case is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund request case to agent Sarah for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund request faster.
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789, and I’ve attached a photo showing the item I received which is different from what I ordered.
We have reviewed your case and will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 5-7 business days. No need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for your help and quick solution. I’m glad the refund will be processed without requiring me to return the wrong product.
I have confirmed that your refund is now processed. You should see the amount reflected on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with how we handled your issue.
We are closing this case now as resolved. Please reach out again if you need any further assistance.
